segments.text: I look at the boy on the stool, reaching into the cookie jar, and feel a rush of anxiety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles beneath him, creating a sense of imminent danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why would he risk a fall for a cookie?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, eagerly waiting, her hand outstretched like a hopeful bird.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they think they can get away with this while their mother is right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s as if they’re playing a game where the stakes are much higher than they realize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry for both of them, caught in their mischievous little world, unaware of the hazards around them.
segments.speaker: PAR
